group_1.textLeft: ...Don't stare at me like that.@You're gonna make me blush...
...What?

group_1.textRight: The truth is, San... I've been in love with you@for the longest time...

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*
HEY! The hell are you doing?!
You promised you wouldn't say anything@that'd put her on the spot like that!

group_1.textRight: Taking advantage of San's kindness,@coddling her...
Aren't YOU the one who's been hurting her@and causing trouble?

group_1.textLeft: Wha–?!

group_1.textRight: I'M gonna be the one to make her happy...

group_1.textLeft: ...I've been watchin' over her longer than@anyone else. Think about how I must feel!

group_1.textCenter: I just want us all to keep smiling together!
Please, Big Bro Tatsu...@All of you!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And then the Instructor's tears brought all the@Youth Association guys back to their senses!

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely not.

group_1.textRight: But, like, doesn't that sort of thing basically@happen all the time in romance movies?

group_1.textLeft: On TV, yes. Real life doesn't tend to work@that way.

group_1.textRight: Those guys are kinda rough around the edges...
But they love you, Instructor.@I feel like there's still a shot at it, y'know?

group_1.textLeft: For starters, I regularly go to the beach with the@other Youth Association members to have fun.
They've already seen me in a swimsuit, so there's@no reason why they would feel strange about it.
Furthermore, they've all been with me since@I was a child.
There is no room for romantic feelings@in the slightest.

group_1.textRight: So you've legit never felt anything like that,@like, ever?

group_1.textLeft: ...No, [chara:103101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103101:cheek_0][chara:103101:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]I can't say I have...

group_1.textRight: Was that a little fluster I saw?@It totally was, kyaha!★

group_1.textLeft: ...Awfully persistent, aren't we?
I don't mind your typical self, Your Highness,@but I cannot keep up with your lovesick brain.
I've got some errands to run, so I'd best be@on my way.

group_1.textRight: Don't be such a killjoy, Instructor! Stick around@and hang out with me a li'l looonger!

group_1.textCenter: (When I wore the swimsuit that Her Highness@had advised me to purchase...)

group_1.textLeft: Hm? What's up, Big Bro Tatsu?

group_1.textRight: You're rockin' that swimsuit.@Makes ya look more mature than usual.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103150:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
Don't ogle me without permission!
And that's the kinda stuff that Yama@from the liquor store would say.

group_1.textRight: Oi, c'mon, don't treat me like an old man.@I'm only in my twenties, ya know?

group_1.textCenter: (At the time, I feigned anger to cover it up,)
(but it made me happy to have someone who's@been watching over me for so long...)
...Not that I'd ever breathe a word of this@to the Princess.
